SetupTraits.Name: Monsters
SetupTraits.Description: Demons do not flee or negotiate.

SetupTraits.Name: Legion
SetupTraits.Description: When fighting demons, at the start of combat, place 5 Natals, this faction's special mob, on the map in unoccupied space somewhere outside of range 2 of players. These don't count for the total encounter budget.

Traits.Name: Summon
Traits.Description: Natals disappear when reduced to 0 hp and don't cause engagement.

Actions.Name: Void Vomit
Actions.Description: Deal 1 piercing damage as an effect to a character in range 3. If that character is adjacent to another demon, increase damage to 2.
